short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate between recently active tabs using custom keyboard shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Navigator - Effortless Tab Switch Between Recent Tabs

Are you tired of losing track of your tabs or constantly switching between multiple open tabs? Meet Tab Switcher, the ultimate and also simple solution for managing your tab history and enhancing your productivity for faster tab switch.

Key Features:
üîÑ Seamless Tab Navigation
Easily switch between your most recently used tabs with customizable keyboard shortcuts. Whether you're juggling research tabs or managing multiple projects, Tab Navigator helps you stay organized.

üîç Dynamic Tab History
Keep a detailed history of your recently activated tabs. With Tab Navigator, you can see where you've been and quickly jump back to any tab, saving you time and effort.

üóÇ Customizable History Settings
Allow or Disallow Duplicates: Choose whether to keep duplicates in your tab history. Perfect for users who want a clean, concise history or those who need every step of their browsing journey.
Move Duplicates to Top: If you revisit a tab often, Tab Navigator can automatically move it to the top of your history, ensuring quick access to your most-used tabs.

üîß User-Friendly Options
Tailor the extension to your needs with an intuitive options page. Set your desired history limit, control duplicate handling, and personalize your browsing experience with ease.

üöÄ Boost Your Productivity
Say goodbye to the frustration of lost tabs or repetitive tab switching. Tab Navigator streamlines your workflow, helping you focus on what matters most.

How to Use:
Install the extension and customize your settings via the options page.
Use keyboard shortcuts to quickly switch between your recent tabs. You can change shortcut too.
